title: League Down?
body: Just finished a soloq and then client insta crashed and now it wont let me re-open it

replies.body: The client itself isn't opening anymore or did you mean you weren't able to get reconnected to the game itself? If the client won't open up it could be if some of the game processes are still running. You should be able to close those out with the task manager, but if that doesn't work try rebooting your pc really quickly for a fresh start.
I've had my client open since I woke up, occasionally jumping into matches. Hasn't gone down for me.
